post.body: Man that sucks. The economic condition isn't the greatest right now, but I'm sure your job will be okay. They need new recruits
Its interesting 2 look how powerful emotion can be when branding. The personification of the mini cooper is pretty crazy too.
Thanks for the heads up! This is right up my alley!
I applied for here in Pitts/ Philly area, with hopes of being able to start here and eventually transfer to Seattle!
I hope to hear from Comcast about a marketing position I applied for. The more I think about it, it would fit perfectly into my life plans.
Shhhh...
Awkward. Lol
Erin i'm glad you're safe
My cousin won NM Gatorade Player of the Year!
I can't find my keys :(
I think I'm mastering the skills of photo-ops and sound bites!
WTF?! Travel Channel transformed to a home shopping channel before my eyes! I can't sleep now!
I can't bring myself to concentrate tonight...
Straightening up the room a little bit. Then studying for Econ and maybe working on a paper.
I officially own my cap and gown.
Sometimes we're in heaven then we're sent back to hell again. Back to the last week of class.
I got myself a DS!
I'll be back tomorrow morning.
DID YOU SEE THAT! GO STEELERS!
Yeah be safe guys.
http://rundc08.com/SHOP.html - WANT ONE! I hope they're still selling after the holiday!
Alright kids, I'm officially out. It's truly been a pleasure. I wish you all luck in all you do, and I look forward to hearing from all of u
Everyone's still asleep after yesterdays festivities
Counting down..
I graduate today!
And welcome to tumblr Frankie!
I guess it's all for real now. Thanks for all the love!
French grade is in.. I've officially filled my last requirement for graduation from Penn State University.
Moving from one computer screen to another. Done editing, now writing papers.
Working on the video for Dr. Brown again... Talk about dedication.
So tired of writing papers. I don't want to look at a computer screen for awhile after this.
